definition: broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects
healthy/peaceful/abundant
surname Kang
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
surname Zhuang
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: But its step of on science development broad road is afteractually the 80's.
sentences.chinese: 但它步上科學發展的康莊大道卻是在八十年代以後。

sentences.english: You are right, we are in the path to socialism.
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，我們正走在通往社會主義的康莊大道上。
人生並不都是康莊大道。

sentences.english: Coz there is always a straight way to the point you see.
sentences.chinese: 因爲總有著一條康莊大道通往你所看到的地方。

sentences.english: There is no royal road to learning .
sentences.chinese: 在學習上沒有康莊大道好走。

sentences.english: Learning to ignore is one of the great paths to inner peace.
sentences.chinese: 學會忽略是通向內心平靜的康莊大道。

sentences.english: I know life is not all roses, but still, that's just too much.
sentences.chinese: 我知道人生並不總是康莊大道，可他遭遇得也太多了。

sentences.english: As you walked in the broad road, Yi Road win.
sentences.chinese: 同您一起走在康莊大道上，宜路贏。

sentences.english: Are we on our way to waving goodbye to wires once and for all?
sentences.chinese: 我們是否正通向徹底告別線材的康莊大道呢？

definition: different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
self-actualization (psychology)/self-realization
to struggle arduously
full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

definition: to meet a challenge
industrious and hard-working/conscientious and meticulous
single-log bridge/(fig.) difficult path
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
socio-economic base/economic foundation
proactive
prosperous and developing/flourishing
nowhere to go/at the end of one's tether
to stake all on one throw
